sen.j: 地下請（じげうけ）とは、中世日本の村落が、荘園・国衙領への年貢徴収を領主から請け負っていた制度。
sen.e: Jigeuke was a system in which village communities of medieval Japan undertook the task of feudal lords to collect nengu (land tax) to be paid to shoen (manor in medieval Japan) or Kokugaryo (territories governed by provincial government office).
